com.jswiff.swfrecords
Class MorphLineStyles

java.lang.Object
  com.jswiff.swfrecords.MorphLineStyles
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public final class MorphLineStyles
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Implements an array of line styles used in a morph sequence. Line styles are defined pairwise in MorphLineStyle or MorphLineStyle2 instances.

WARNING: array index starts at 1, not 0!

See Also:
MorphLineStyle, MorphLineStyle2, DefineMorphShape, DefineMorphShape2, Serialized Form

Method Detail

addStyle

public void addStyle(java.lang.Object lineStyle)
Adds a morph line style at the end of the array. Use either MorphLineStyle or MorphLineStyle2 instances.

Parameters:
lineStyle - a morph line style

getSize

public int getSize()
Returns the size of the morph line style array.

Returns:
array size

getStyle

public java.lang.Object getStyle(int index)

Returns the morph line style at the specified position in the array. Can be a MorphLineStyle or a MorphLineStyle2 instance.

WARNING: indexes start at 1, not at 0!

Parameters:
index - index starting at 1
Returns:
morph line style located at the specified position

getStyles

public java.util.List getStyles()
Returns all contained morph line styles as a list.

Returns:
all morph line styles
